column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Large portions and the service is good. The real innovation here is they'll take your pizza order while you wait for your table
column2: so it's not 90 minutes from getting in line to eating your slice. Wings were quite good. IMO Chicago-style pizza is the most overrated food in America
column3: and this place didn't change my mind. But it's Chicago
column4: you're gonna wind up in a place like this
column5: and if you're here you're gonna be just fine.
